name: Dawn in Lake City
description:
Become the fastest, and more important, RICHEST frog of Lake City, grab the keys of your swamp motorboat, grease the fan, and HAVE FUN!!  Slide through the river and catch the bigger amount of coins as fast as possible in order to get to Lake City. The lights and feathers of this town will let you stunned. 

In Dawn in Lake City you must drive your boat using the WASD, arrows or the left joystick of your favourite controller to get to the end of the world in less than 1 minute beacuse this was the theme for this gamejam. 

And remember that these kind of boats have a lot of inertia when turning!

We are Marcos and Rodrigo, members of a are a small team of developers who love to make games in their free time. Dawn in Lake City, is a game that we tried to make for the Trijam #155 but it was too much game for that little time (just 3 hours!!). But we had the character controller working great so we decided to go for it and finish it spending the less time possible. We really like the final result and we hope you like it! Follow us on Twitter if you want to receive news about our bigger projects!

You can find us here!

Feel free to email us at: firsttrystudios@gmail.com
